description: A cog for moderating messages using OpenAI's omni-moderation endpoint.
install_msg:
## :white_check_mark: Successfully installed OpenAI Omni.
Configure the cog using `[p]openaimod` commands.
end_user_data_statement: This cog stores server-specific configuration data such as API keys and moderation settings.
name: openai-omni
